thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Jay
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Jay

author: Jay
title: Jay
text: The overall experience was pretty good. We booked a mid-sized economy sedan for a week in Christchurch. The pick up was prompt and check-in was hassle free. The car was pretty old (135K kms) but had new tires. It rattled and squeaked a bit but drove well. It was pretty dusty when we got it but the staff was quick to take it back for a quick clean. For the price we paid, I was pretty happy overall. Happy to use their service again.
